remarks: Define a canonical mapping between functions from ` A ` into subsets of ` B ` and the relations with domain ` A ` and range within ` B ` .  Note that the same relation is used in ~ axdc2lem and ~ marypha2lem1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2017.)
statement:
fpwrelmap.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
fpwrelmap.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
fpwrelmap.3 $e |- M = ( f e. ( ~P B ^m A ) |-> { <. x , y >. | ( x e. A /\ y e. ( f ` x ) ) } ) $.
fpwrelmap $p |- M : ( ~P B ^m A ) -1-1-onto-> ~P ( A X. B ) $.
$d A f x y $.
$d B f x y $.
